com.psddev.dari.util

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends Object
    Global map of settings.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CLASS_SUB_SETTING
      Sub-key used to identify the implementation class for newInstance(java.lang.Class<T>, java.lang.String).
      static String DEBUG_SETTING
      Key used to toggle debug mode.
      static String PRODUCTION_SETTING
      Key used to indicate when running in a production environment.
      static String SETTINGS_FILE
      Default properties file that contains all settings.

      • getOrError

        public static Object getOrError(String key,
                String message)
        Returns the value associated with the given key, or throws a SettingsException with the given message if not found or the value is blank.
        Parameters:
        key - Can be null.
        message - Can be null.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - If the value associated with the given key isn't found or is blank.

      • newInstance

        public static <T extends SettingsBackedObject> T newInstance(Class<T> interfaceClass,
                                             String key)
        Creates an instance of the given interfaceClass based on the values associated with the given key.
        Parameters:
        interfaceClass - Can't be null.
        key - Can't be blank.
        Returns:
        Never null.
        Throws:
        SettingsException - If the values associated with the given key can't be used to create the instance.
